Plot: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.
Title: Harry Brown
Actors: Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer, Charlie Creed-Miles, David Bradley
tomatoConsensus: Its lurid violence may put off some viewers, but Harry Brown is a vigilante thriller that carries an emotional as well as a physical punch, thanks to a gripping performance from Michael Caine in the title role.
